#summary Check list for preparing a release

  * add new release date and info to Readme.txt
  * svn export trunk, ommitting externals
  * archive and upload to google code, mark as _featured_
  * add note http://arcmapbook.googlepages.com/
  * upload release archive to http://arcscripts.esri.com/details.asp?dbid=15364 and update old version note via http://arcscripts.esri.com/UserScripts.asp
  * add note to [http://forums.esri.com/Thread.asp?c=93&f=989&t=211395 DS MapBook - New Version]
